price: 6. ¡Oh, hombre (que niegas la verdad)!, ¿qué te sedujo y te apartó de tu Generoso Señor,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
